title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 700.6 - Hours for public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 700.6 - Hours for public inspection

State Regulations

Requests for public access to records shall be accepted and
records produced during all hours the offices of the Department of Labor are
regularly open for business. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
700.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
